entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023
